column2: we were seated (at 9:47!) and had a very kind and patient server who did a great job. The food was outstanding... the shrimp in garlic and olive oil with red pepper flakes was the best I've had by far at the versions at Iberico
column5: or Sangria. Other highlights were the skirt steak with green onions and herbed butter... jockeying with the shrimp to be my favorite!
